security.title: Security Features

features.title: Local Processing
features.desc: The encryption process executes entirely in the browser locally, without uploading any data. Supports offline use and protects privacy.

features.title: Visual Obfuscation
features.desc: Hides real content through visually similar characters, suitable for scenarios requiring visual concealment.

features.title: Fully Reversible
features.desc: Standard mode guarantees 100% reversibility with no information loss.

security.warning: Note: This tool is primarily for visual obfuscation and does not provide encryption security protection. For real security encryption, please use professional encryption algorithms.

items.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
items.desc: Ctrl+Enter to encrypt/decrypt, Ctrl+K to clear input

items.title: Font Optimization
items.desc: Cipher area uses monospace font to enhance visual obfuscation

items.title: Real-time Validation
items.desc: Automatically validates format and shows status when inputting cipher

items.title: Reversibility Guarantee
items.desc: Standard mode ensures completely reversible encryption/decryption with no information loss

items.label: Character Set
items.value: O (Uppercase O), 0 (Digit Zero), I (Uppercase I), l (Lowercase L)

items.label: Language Support
items.value: All UTF-8 characters including Chinese, English, symbols, etc.

dataIntegrity.title: Data Integrity Protection
dataIntegrity.subtitle: v2 format includes CRC32 checksum for transmission integrity assurance

features.title: CRC32 Checksum
features.desc: Automatic calculation and verification of 32-bit cyclic redundancy check for data transmission error detection

features.title: Seamless Integration
features.desc: Checksum encoded as O0Il format, maintaining visual coherence, with last 16 characters as checksum

features.title: Smart Detection
features.desc: Automatic format recognition ensuring backward compatibility, legacy format still works normally

features.title: Fast Verification
features.desc: Automatic verification during decryption, CRC calculation is extremely fast with virtually no performance impact
